text: - He's dreaming now. Who are you dreaming of? You know what? - No one knows. - He dreams about you. And if I stopped dreaming, what would you be? - I don't know. - What? - You'd disappear. You're a figure from his dream. If that King woke up, you'd be out like a candle. Alice through the mirror, 1871
title: El sueño del rey
author: Lewis Carroll
